summary.span: 表示 的约束集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of constraints for a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过 属性访问。The is accessed through the property. 可以包含 的和对象 。The can contain both and objects for the . 对象可确保特定列中的数据始终是唯一的，以便保持数据的完整性。A object makes sure that data in a specific column is always unique to preserve the data integrity. 确定在更新或删除中的数据时相关表中将发生的情况 。The determines what will occur in related tables when data in the is either updated or deleted. 例如，如果删除某行， 将确定是否也 (级联) 或其他操作过程中删除相关行。For example, if a row is deleted, the will determine whether the related rows are also deleted (a cascade), or some other course of action. > [!NOTE] > 当你将 创建两个表之间的关系的添加到时 ，将 自动创建和。When you add a that creates a relationship between two tables to a , both a and a are created automatically. 应用于父项中的主键列 ，并且将约束添加到该表的中 。The is applied to the primary key column in the parent , and the constraint is added to that table's . 应用于主键列和外键列，并将约束添加到子表的 。The is applied to the primary key column and the foreign key column, and the constraint is added to the child table's . 使用标准集合方法 ，例如、 和 。The uses standard collection methods such as , , and . 此外，该 方法可用于查找集合中是否存在特定的约束。In addition, the method can be used to look for the existence of a particular constraint in the collection. 当的属性设置为时，将创建一个，并将 其 属性设置为 `true` 对象的 。A is created when a with its property set to `true` is added to a object's . 在 将添加到 对象的时创建 。A is created when a is added to a object's . ## Examples 第一个示例创建一个 ，并添加 其 属性设置为 `true`) 的 ( 。The first example creates a , and adds a (with its property set to `true`) to the . 第二个示例创建一个 、两个 对象、四个列和一个 。The second example creates a , two objects, four columns, and a . 然后，将打印约束的计数，以显示在将 添加到对象的时创建和 。The count of constraints is then printed to show that a and a are created when a is added to the object's . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

param.name: constraints
param.span: 要添加到集合中的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects to add to the collection.

summary.span: 将指定的 数组的元素复制到集合末尾。

span.span: Copies the elements of the specified array to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 调用了， `AddRange` 则在调用之前，不会将任何对象添加到集合中 。If has been called, `AddRange` does not add any objects to the collection until is called. `EndInit`调用时，将使用最近对的调用中指定的项填充集合 `AddRange` 。At the time that `EndInit` is called, the collection will be populated with the items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange`. 如果在 `AddRange` 序列内多次调用 `BeginInit` / `EndInit` ，则只会添加在最新调用中指定的那些项 `AddRange` 。If `AddRange` is called multiple times within a `BeginInit` / `EndInit` sequence, only those items specified in the most recent call to `AddRange` are added. ## Examples 下面的示例创建主键和外键约束，并将其添加到中 。The following example creates primary and foreign key constraints, and adds them to the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.AddRange Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 指示是否可移除 。

span.span: Indicates whether a can be removed.

returns.span: 如果可从集合中移除 ，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the can be removed from collection; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当向添加时，默认行为 是向 父表和 子表添加一个。The default behavior whenever a is added to a , is to add a to the parent table and a to the child table. 应用于父表的主键列，并且 应用于子表的外键列。The is applied to the primary key column of the parent table, and the is applied to the foreign key column of the child table. 由于在 删除之前尝试删除 会导致引发异常，因此在 调用 remove 之前应始终使用方法，以确保 可删除。Because trying to remove the before removing the causes an exception to be thrown, you should always use the method before calling Remove, to make sure that the can be removed. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法来确定是否 可以删除，然后再尝试删除它。The following example uses the method to determine whether a can be removed, before trying to remove it. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData ConstraintCollection.CanRemove Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
